ðŸ‘‹ Hi

I’m Andrew Flemming (he/him). I design, develop, support, sell, and maintain CurlBook. I created CurlBook because I believe that collecting the right data during curling games can unlock insights that will help your team win more games.

Contact

If you have questions, need help, or just want to talk about CurlBook, please send me an email at andrew@curlbook.ca

Other Products

If you’re trying to up your game, check out the SmartBroom

item.title: CurlBook Privacy Policy
item.description:
This policy applies to all information collected or submitted in the CurlBook app on iPad.

Information Collected

I do not collect any user-generated data, and none of your data is visible to me.

I collect anonymous statistics regarding usage, to help inform future development and features.

iCloud

CurlBook may store some of your data in Appleâ€™s iCloud service, to enable sync features between all devices signed into your Apple ID. This data is not accessible or visible to me.
